content: let s make a tote-ally trendy crochet bag this project features caron anniversary cakes and the joined treble_crochet stitch which creates a beautiful sturdy fabric that showcases the unique striping effect of this yarn practice chain double_crochet single_crochet and more front back and side gusset are made separately joined and then finished up with top handles enjoy this grab n go favorite on all your daily adventures materials caron® anniversary cakes™ 35 3 oz/1000 g 1061 yds/970 m prism 7039 1 ball or 721 yds/660 m gauge 10 joined treble_crochet and 4 row = 4 10 cm measurements approx 15 38 cm wide x 10 25 5 cm tall x 4 10 cm deep excluding handle
